fr.insa.rennes.info.chemical.backend
Class RandomIncrementStrategy

java.lang.Object
  fr.insa.rennes.info.chemical.backend.RandomIncrementStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IncrementStrategy
 class RandomIncrementStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IncrementStrategy

This class implements an random strategy: the elements are randomly selected in order to simulate a chemical reaction.

Author:
Cédric Andreolli, Chloé Boulanger, Olivier Cléro, Antoine Guellier, Sébastien Guilloux, Arthur Templé

Method Detail

increment

public SubIndexProviderSolution increment(SubIndexProviderSolution solution)
                                   throws ChemicalException
The function is pretty much the same as the one in the OrderedIncrementStrategy class but it "translates" the ordered value to the "random" value with the map

Specified by:
increment in interface IncrementStrategy
Parameters:

_maxIndex - The maximum values of the indexes
Returns:
A table of integers that is the new value of the indexes
